change.item: Revised to update encoding by Samira Bozorgi
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Phillips Ruopp Papers)//EN" "reg_124.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory of the Phillips Ruopp Papers, 1931-1993
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Writings, correspondence, memoranda, reports, printed matter, and photographs, relating to international education, international relations and development programs, the College of the Virgin Islands, the United States Peace Corps, the Charles F. Kettering Foundation, and world federalist and other international organizations.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Phillips Ruopp Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1990.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

did.unittitle: Speeches and writings. Typescripts, holographs, printed articles, serial issues, clippings, newsletters, reports, speeches, course descriptions, and lecture notes, 1948-1993
World federalist organizations, international education, international relations, developing nations, and educational institutions, 1947-1969
Peace Corps. Memoranda, program statements, research proposal, and training manuals, 1967-1970
Charles F. Kettering Foundation. Memoranda, correspondence, reports, agenda, minutes, printed articles, pamphlets, annual reports, conference material, and photographs, 1969-1989
